mapper.insert: insert into buy (BUYID, BUYCOUNT, BUYTIME, PROVID, PRODID, DEPARTID) values (#{buyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buycount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update buy set BUYCOUNT = #{buycount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BUYTIME = #{buytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROVID = #{provid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODID = #{prodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPARTID = #{departid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where BUYID = #{buyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BUYID, BUYCOUNT, BUYTIME, PROVID, PRODID, DEPARTID from buy
